attributes.action: Track down & deport bogus students doing immigration fraud.
attributes.additional_details: U.K. Colleges and university must have the responsibility of cancelling status of false students not attending the rest of the classes. If a student left the course immediately after registration, and they swiped to leave , the student card will show the time the attended and left. The home office must be able to track the record without contacting the college or university. Twenty failed unauthorised attendances must automatically cancel the visa status (authorised by hospital only).
attributes.background: U.K has a reputation for its education system and  must not be violated by bogus students who do not wish to attend a course.- Student Cards to be highly connected to the home office, which must be swiped during registration, twenty failed attendances, must result in visa cancellation.
